description: Stretch one of your arms with the palm of your hand forward, then pull your fingers up for 10 seconds on each hand.
Stretch one of your arms against your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 second on each arm.
Pull your neck with the help of your hand to the right and to the left, staying like that during some seconds.
With both hands behind your head, put it down, stretching the nape.
Cross your legs and go down with your hands outstretched towards the ground. Repeat the movement with the other leg.
Sit down, legs open, try to reach the palms of your hand in the ground, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull one knee to your chest e hold, change legs after 10 seconds.
Sit down, legs crossed, lean your torso forward, change legs after 10 seconds.
Sit down, close your eyes, and cover them with the palm of your hands for 2 minutes, open them normally after.
In an open environment, look the furthermost that you can in four directions for 3 seconds, but just move your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage your eyelids in circular movements for 15 seconds.
Stand up, rotate your waist the maximum you can to the left, hold it for 5 seconds. Repeat to the right.
